entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who has access to a mysterious trunk. He is described as closing and opening the trunk multiple times, revealing different contents each time.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is watching Dumbledore open the trunk. He is described as being astounded by what he sees.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is introduced as a character who is lying on the floor of an underground room, apparently fast asleep and thin in appearance.

entities.name: snakoscope
entities.description: Snakescopes are mentioned as being broken and contained in one of the compartments of the trunk.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as looking like a silvery object contained in one of the compartments of the trunk.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has access to the mysterious trunk, as he is able to close and open it multiple times.
Harry watches Dumbledore as he opens the trunk and reveals its contents.
Mad-Eye Moody is lying on the floor of an underground room.
